title: Anova Culinary Precision Port Handheld Vacuum Sealer,BLACK
features: The NEW compact and cordless Anova Precision Port Handheld Vacuum Sealer is an ideal sealing solution for sous vide, food storage, or prepping meals. The integrated Precision Port suction valve works to easily and securely seal Anova brand vacuum bags and accessories with an Anova Precision Port airway.

KEEP IT FRESH: Along with sealing for sous vide cooking, vacuum sealing is a quick and easy way to extend the shelf life of most foods. Perishables like meats, vegetables, cheeses, grains, coffee, and even leftovers all stay fresher, for longer.

SMALL BUT MIGHTY: The USB rechargeable, long lasting lithium-ion battery allows for up to 150 seals off a single charge. Combine that with an ultra compact form factor and you’ve got the ability to vacuum seal at the touch of a single button, and easily stash your sealer away when not in use. With its sleek silhouette, you might even just want to leave it out on the counter for convenience.

EASY TO USE: The Precision Port airway system makes sealing easier than ever. Just line up the valve, apply pressure, and start sealing at the touch of a button. With the easy-zip top bags, you’ll be able to seal, open, and reseal that bag as many times as needed, for maximum freshness. We've even included a set of bags to get you started.

MARINADE FRIENDLY: This sealer has been specially designed to keep liquids from entering the pump while sealing moist foods. Should any unwanted liquids find their way inside the machine, the vacuum base is removable and easy to clean.
description: The NEW Anova Precision Port Handheld Vacuum Sealer is a compact and cordless sealing solution for sous vide, food storage, or prepping meals. The USB rechargeable, long lasting battery allows for up to 150 seals off a single charge, and the Precision Port airway makes sealing easier than ever. Just line up the valve, apply pressure, and start sealing at the touch of a button. With the easy-zip top, you’ll be able to seal, open, and reseal that bag as many times as needed, for maximum freshness. We’ve even included a set of Anova Precision Port Vacuum Bags to start you off. They’re durable, resealable, and even reusable when used for storing many mild, non messy, foods.
